fixedProperties.description: Fixed properties in the query, can't be edited in the interface (e.g. scoping down by person)

anyOf.description: Return a limited set of data

detail.description: A human-readable string with additional information about this item, like type or symbol information.

documentation.description: A human-readable string that represents a doc-comment.

insertText.description: A string or snippet that should be inserted in a document when selecting this completion.

kind.description: The kind of this completion item. Based on the kind an icon is chosen by the editor.

label.description: The label of this completion item. By default this is also the text that is inserted when selecting this completion.

allowSorting.description: Can the user click on column headers to sort the table? (default: true)

columns.description: Columns shown in the table, unless the `source` provides them.

embedded.description: Uses the embedded version of LemonTable

expandable.description: Can expand row to show raw event data (default: true)

full.description: Show with most visual options enabled. Used in scenes.

hiddenColumns.description: Columns that aren't shown in the table, even if in columns or returned data

propertiesViaUrl.description: Link properties via the URL (default: false)

showActions.description: Show the kebab menu at the end of the row

showColumnConfigurator.description: Show a button to configure the table's columns if possible

showElapsedTime.description: Show the time it takes to run a query

showEventFilter.description: Include an event filter above the table (EventsNode only)

showHogQLEditor.description: Include a HogQL query editor above HogQL tables

showOpenEditorButton.description: Show a button to open the current query as a new insight. (default: true)

showPersistentColumnConfigurator.description: Show a button to configure and persist the table's default columns if possible

showPropertyFilter.description: Include a property filter above the table

showSavedQueries.description: Shows a list of saved queries

showSearch.description: Include a free text search field (PersonsNode only)

showTestAccountFilters.description: Show filter to exclude test accounts

showTimings.description: Show a detailed query timing breakdown

fixedProperties.description: Fixed properties in the query, can't be edited in the interface (e.g. scoping down by person)

event.description: The event or `null` for all events.

response.description: Return a limited set of data

actionId.description: Show events matching a given action

after.description: Only fetch events that happened after this timestamp

before.description: Only fetch events that happened before this timestamp

event.description: Limit to events matching this string

fixedProperties.description: Fixed properties in the query, can't be edited in the interface (e.g. scoping down by person)

offset.description: Number of rows to skip before returning rows

personId.description: Show events for a given person

select.description: Return a limited set of data. Required.

where.description: HogQL filters to apply on returned data

explicit_date.description: Whether the `date_from` and `date_to` should be used verbatim. Disables rounding to the start and end of period. Strings are cast to bools, e.g. "true" -> true.

fixedProperties.description: Fixed properties in the query, can't be edited in the interface (e.g. scoping down by person)

event.description: The event or `null` for all events.

fixedProperties.description: Fixed properties in the query, can't be edited in the interface (e.g. scoping down by person)

response.description: Return a limited set of data

funnelCustomSteps.description: Custom step numbers to get persons for. This overrides `funnelStep`.

funnelStep.description: Index of the step for which we want to get the timestamp for, per person. Positive for converted persons, negative for dropped of persons.

funnelStepBreakdown.description: The breakdown value for which to get persons for. This is an array for person and event properties, a string for groups and an integer for cohorts.

FunnelsFilterLegacy.description: `FunnelsFilterType` minus everything inherited from `FilterType` and persons modal related params and `hidden_legend_keys` replaced by `hidden_legend_breakdowns`

breakdownFilter.description: Breakdown of the events and actions

filterTestAccounts.description: Exclude internal and test users by applying the respective filters

funnelsFilter.description: Properties specific to the funnels insight

interval.description: Granularity of the response. Can be one of `hour`, `day`, `week` or `month`

endPosition.description: End position of the editor word

filters.description: Table to validate the expression against

startPosition.description: Start position of the editor word

incomplete_list.description: Whether or not the suggestions returned are complete

timings.description: Measured timings for different parts of the query generation process

HogQLFilters.description: Filters object that will be converted to a HogQL {filters} placeholder

debug.description: Enable more verbose output, usually run from the /debug page

expr.description: HogQL expression to validate (use `select` or `expr`, but not both)

exprSource.description: Query within which "expr" is validated. Defaults to "select * from events"

filters.description: Extra filters applied to query via {filters}

select.description: Full select query to validate (use `select` or `expr`, but not both)

table.description: Table to validate the expression against

values.description: Constant values that can be referenced with the {placeholder} syntax in the query

HogQLQueryModifiers.description: HogQL Query Options are automatically set per team. However, they can be overriden in the query.

error.description: Query error. Returned only if 'explain' is true. Throws an error otherwise.

modifiers.description: Modifiers used when performing the query

timings.description: Measured timings for different parts of the query generation process

interval.description: An interval selected out of available intervals in source query.

value.description: An interval selected out of available intervals in source query

embedded.description: Query is embedded inside another bordered component

full.description: Show with most visual options enabled. Used in insight scene.

InsightsQueryBase.description: Base class for insight query nodes. Should not be used directly.

interval.description: Granularity of the response. Can be one of `hour`, `day`, `week` or `month`

lifecycleFilter.description: Properties specific to the lifecycle insight

Node.description: Node base class, everything else inherits from here

NodeKind.description:
PostHog Query Schema definition.

This file acts as the source of truth for:

- frontend/src/queries/schema.json   - generated from typescript via "pnpm run generate:schema:json"

- posthog/schema.py   - generated from json the above json via "pnpm run generate:schema:python"

PathsFilterLegacy.description: `PathsFilterType` minus everything inherited from `FilterType` and persons modal related params

filterTestAccounts.description: Exclude internal and test users by applying the respective filters

pathsFilter.description: Properties specific to the paths insight

fixedProperties.description: Fixed properties in the query, can't be edited in the interface (e.g. scoping down by person)

async.description: (Experimental) Whether to run the query asynchronously. Defaults to False. If True, the `id` of the query can be used to check the status and to cancel it.

client_query_id.description: Client provided query ID. Can be used to retrieve the status or cancel the query.

query.description:
Submit a JSON string representing a query for PostHog data analysis, for example a HogQL query.

Example payload:

```

{"query": {"kind": "HogQLQuery", "query": "select * from events limit 100"}}

```

For more details on HogQL queries, see the [PostHog HogQL documentation](/docs/hogql#api-access).

incomplete_list.description: Whether or not the suggestions returned are complete

k.description: Key. Shortened to 'k' to save on data.

t.description: Time in seconds. Shortened to 't' to save on data.
